name: Anmol Shetty
title: Data Analyst & Engineer
tagline: Transforming complex data into actionable insights
availability: Available for full-time opportunities starting December 2026

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Systems
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science

about.summary: I'm a graduate student pursuing a Master's in Information Systems at Northeastern University, specializing in data engineering and analytics. I transform complex data into actionable insights that drive business decisions.
about.mission: Help organizations unlock the full potential of their data through scalable engineering solutions, automated workflows, and compelling visualizations.
about.expertise: With hands-on experience from healthcare analytics at Medicodio and manufacturing quality systems at Spicer India, I've built automated pipelines, optimized data processing, and delivered dashboard solutions that improve decision-making speed by up to 40%.
